description: Late to the party with this one but yes yes yes. I will play this any time and maybe only with friends as it really is about that negation part of things where this shines  In my top 10

title: Played fir...
description: Played first with no aliens and no flares to teach the family. Everyone from 9 to 40 caught on quickly, so I ran through a couple of Alien powers and then assigned them randomly.I love watching emergent strategies around the table as people try different things and different alliances. This one is going to run and run.

title: Immediate ...
description: Immediate hit with our group of mostly eurogamers. The wild alien powers are fun, fun, fun!

title: Fall 2014....
description: Fall 2014. Started tracking games late. Add about 10 to the number of plays.

title: I like thi...
description: I like this game, although not as much as some.  I find that it tends to end too quickly.  Racial special powers can sometimes only be used once before the end of the game.  Negotiating aspect can make this one run long for our group.  Still, sci-fi theme is enjoyable and replay value is limitless given the huge number of different races.

title: The epic s...
description: The epic space game of infinite possibilities!

title: Every alie...
description: Every alien is OP and meant to break the game.  The only way this game can be bad is if all players get the draw of crappy aliens, which is rare.
